column2: Worked on key operations with hash implementation and forwarding to other nodes. Worked in conjunction with adbhagat.
Worked on choosing and implementing hash implementation and forwarding requests between nodes. Helped debug, worked with ssangama.
Designed and implemented gossip, shard partitioning, and causal context.
Worked on adding the key-count and view change endpoints into our code. Worked in conjunction with jaburdic.
